{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=R10000G |revision= |upc=850214003188 |ean= |asin=B006UACRVO |price= |est_release_date=01/30/2012 |fcc_date=01/18/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Loopcomm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=ZTT-R10000G |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8198 |cpu1_cspeed=620 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=high power |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Amped_R10000G |default_ssid_regex=^Amped_R10000G$ |default_ip=192.168.3.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F8:7B:8C |oui_eth=F8:7B:8C }} ''High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Router''
[http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/r10000g.html Product page] [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31699-amped-wireless-r10000g-reviewed Reviewed on SmallNetBuilder] "LPC0042 REV:1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This is a Loopcomm device. The default SSID, according to the FCC label, is '''Amped_R10000G'''. The default PSK should be '''wireless'''. Per WiGLE, the OUI is probably F8:7B:8C. ==Images== File:Amped Wireless R10000G 1.png File:Amped Wireless R10000G 2.png File:Amped Wireless R10000G 3.png File:Amped Wireless R10000G 4.png [[Has images::external| ]]
